title: CLDF dataset derived from Seifart and Echeverri's "Proto Bora-Muinane.
citation: Seifart, Frank and Echeverri, Juán Álvaro. 2015. Proto Bora-Muinane. LIAMES 15(2): 279-311.
description: The dataset provides the reconstructions for Proto Bora-Muinane, a small language family from the north-western Amazon.
